document.full_text: yemen's opposition has agreed to take part in a transitional government under a gulf-negotiated peace plan for veteran leader ali abdullah saleh to step aside, an opposition source told reuters on monday.
document.title: yemen's opposition agrees to gulf transition plan
lines_and_colors: yemen's opposition has agreed to take part in a transitional government under a gulf-negotiated peace plan for veteran leader ali abdullah saleh to step aside, an opposition source told reuters on monday.
